title: Interactive MCQ Test Platform
description: This is an online MCQ Test Platform where innovation meets education. Built with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, and MySQL, our platform offers a seamless and dynamic testing experience

title: TextUtils : Your Ultimate Text Manipulation Tool
description: TextUtils is your one-stop destination for simplifying text editing tasks. With an intuitive interface and powerful features, TextUtils empowers you to manipulate text effortlessly. From capitalizing and lowercasing text to duplicating content and clearing text fields, TextUtils offers everything you need in a text manipulation tool.
